 PREV CLASS  NEXT CLASS           FRAMES    NO FRAMES DETAIL:   CONSTRUCTORS |  METHODS |  FIELDS

Class brave.Tracing.Builder

Added Methods
Builder addSpanHandler(SpanHandler) Inputs receive {code (context span)} pairs for every {@linkplain TraceContext#sampledLocal() locally sampled} span.
Builder alwaysSampleLocal() When true all spans become real spans even if they aren't sampled remotely.
Builder clearSpanHandlers() Clears all {@linkplain SpanHandler span handlers}.
Set spanHandlers() Returns an immutable copy of the current {@linkplain #addSpanHandler(SpanHandler) span handlers}.
 

Changed Methods
Builder addFinishedSpanHandler(FinishedSpanHandler) Now deprecated.
 Since 5.12 {@linkplain #addSpanHandler(SpanHandler) add a span handler} that implements {@link SpanHandler#end(TraceContext, MutableSpan, SpanHandler.Cause)} with {@link SpanHandler.Cause#FINISHED}
Builder alwaysReportSpans() Now deprecated.
 Since 5.12, use {@link ZipkinSpanHandler.Builder#alwaysReportSpans(boolean)}
Builder errorParser(ErrorParser) Now deprecated.
 This is only used in Zipkin reporting.
Builder spanReporter(Reporter) Now deprecated.
 Since 5.12, use {@link #addSpanHandler(SpanHandler)} with a {@link zipkin2.reporter.brave.ZipkinSpanHandler}
